html:
10.18.22  9:44 am   What's the inspiration to your music?

      music and non-music

10.18.22  9:08 am   I often find myself struggling to find reasons to keep going. Do you ever have moments like that?

     yes

      Anything that helps you power through?

      it's that green grass on the other side of the fence

10.18.22  7:13 am   opinion on cats?

      neither a cereal nor a soup

10.18.22  6:40 am   Is cereal a soup?

      think bigger

10.18.22  2:27 am   what's the time?

      i have no idea

10.18.22  1:02 am   How long do your (as-yet-unproduced) longest scripts get?

      i have one that's at least 12 minutes and it still doesn't end so it will probably end up longer

10.17.22  11:34 pm   what is the significance of the coast guard in long long long journey

      it's a contrast from what occurred at that same position in previous verses

10.17.22  10:48 pm   any thoughts on becoming a professional book stacker?

      there are machines to do it now

10.17.22  9:44 pm   Why did you decide to use the third dimension in your stuff?

      for better spacial depictions

10.17.22  8:27 pm   what is the best alternative liquid for cereal?

      liquified cereal

10.17.22  6:50 pm   When did you decide to abandon all capitalisation

     never

     and why?

      it's too useful. it's almost like having a second font built in. Also, in plaintext situations where style (such as bold) is unavailable, it can be used for emphasis. Also extremely useful for distinguishing the letter L. Also it's hard to write chord symbols without caps, because the lowercase b is used for 'flat'. And many more vital use cases i'm probably forgetting about. a 'STOP' sign with lower case letters would probably look like crap

10.17.22  6:34 pm   what's the weather

      tepid

10.17.22  4:30 pm   favourite thing about the english language

      the popularity

10.17.22  3:23 pm   if cheese is made out of milk, is milk made out of cheese?

     no

10.17.22  2:20 pm   why did the chicken cross the road

      to test it for safety

10.17.22  2:12 pm   when you did a bad thing did you ever consider getting a bad thing eraser at Walmart?

     no

      I hear they're only $37.99

      fake

10.17.22  1:38 pm   when you write skits like "2 friends on the beach," how much thought do you put into the lines? like do you just write it down as it comes or do you think about what to do next?

      thought is usually the enemy of good writing. sometimes it takes a lot of diligence to actually escape from too much thinking

10.17.22  1:32 pm   I've been making an album for over a year or so, but I feel like I've listened to it so much that I hate it and notice all of the tiny bad details about it. Im hyper obsessed about tweaking sounds but at the same time im worried about disappointing the people who actually want to listen to it by delaying it further and tinkering with it like a caveman. 

      how about coming up with a desired release schedule for the next 5 albums. like the follow-through on a golf swing

10.17.22  12:43 pm   Opinion on Ramen?

      priceless

10.17.22  11:41 am   are you one of the great philosophers

      no, but if i was i'm sure i would never admit it

10.17.22  11:25 am   have you ever considered recording an official album, or maybe a compilation of your favorite old songs ?

     no

      speaking of, which of your old (2 or more years ago) videos is your favorite ?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.17.22  10:25 am   Make a video about a man stuck in an ikea and can't get out (very scary!!!)

      that's a good idea but i probably can't do it now that you've mentioned it

10.17.22  8:30 am   are we sure there are only two friends on the beach?

     no

     is the title of the video misleading, perhaps?

      no

10.17.22  7:16 am   do you write your 'o's clockwise or counterclockwise

      let me check. i write them counterclockwise

10.17.22  3:38 am   how do you feel about australia

      good

10.17.22  3:02 am   I'm sure someone has asked this already but what's up with the repetition of "one day we will all be together" in "at the airport terminal" and "at the corner store"? I guess both songs are about a location which many people can relate to visiting, so you want to highlight how this shared experience brings everyone together?

      it must just be a 'me' thing to say. if so, it wouldn't be the first time that's happened

10.17.22  1:06 am   So, I have a song idea that I came up with that I really like, and I decided to try writing it into a full song. But as I'm writing it, I'm finding that the more carefully written parts feel so forced and fake in comparison to the parts that were the initial inspiration for the song. I feel like I have this awesome idea, but the rest of the song just doesn't do it justice. Do you have any tips for my situation?

      keep the good part, and then make the bad parts even worse

10.17.22  1:04 am   I really want to learn how to edit in a similar style to how you do,

     just cut out the bad parts

     any suggestions on software or how to get started?

     you can do this with any software. i've used different software over the years and i hate them all. the best part of the equation is you

10.16.22  10:45 pm   how do you find your way when you're so lost you don't know where to start

      start without knowing where

10.16.22  8:59 pm   whats your opinion

      darkness is actually very bright

10.16.22  8:34 pm   what's your favorite thing about being alive?

      the problems

10.16.22  8:01 pm   Do you want more tea for your tea?

      no

10.16.22  6:59 pm   how do you put up with adversity

      diversity

10.16.22  6:15 pm   What are 3 things that you are currently old enough or young enough to do in Colorado

      climb a mountain

10.16.22  5:18 pm   What's your favourite state welcome sign?

      i'm sure it's one of the ones i haven't seen yet

10.16.22  2:57 pm   so i just bought this 18ish cm tall stone orangutan, what kind of plants should i get to put around it?

      cacti

10.16.22  2:29 pm   do you think that horses are just unicorns that got their horn stole by a lepricon?

      no

10.16.22  1:47 pm   what is your favorite video game

      the on-off switch

10.16.22  1:04 pm   why the hell is everything so sad and dreadful

      to make it mean more when things get better

10.16.22  10:34 am   It's my birthday on 10/18! How should I spend it?

      start planning how you're going to spend the rest of the year

10.16.22  8:48 am   Why do so many people take time and effort
to be ugly to one another?

**ugly being used as a verb, not an adjective  Everyone has some pretty.

      you still used it as an adjective. used as a verb would be "why do people take the time to ugly each other". what you did was change "be ugly" (which already is a verb) into more of a transitive verb by adding "to". anyway, the reason people are ugly to each other is either for survival, by mistake, or for revenge. with survival being the most common, mistake the second most common, and revenge the least common

10.16.22  6:28 am   If you threw a ball in the air would you want to catch it or let it drop to the ground?

      i'd like to try both

10.16.22  5:45 am   I think the waiter in "2 friends on the beach" is very bad at his job. He dumps the food on the table (doesn't even give them plates), gives them an unnecessary amount of forks and no knives, and not six seconds into their meal he already asks them if they want dessert. How did this supposed "top rated restaurant" hire him?

      he hired himself. it's one of those self-hire places

10.16.22  3:07 am   What's the worst part about width

      the girth

10.16.22  2:58 am   could you consider '2 friends on a beach' to be a perfect loop?

     no

      considering it starts and ends with them at the beach

     it would have to loop back before the final beach scene because the final beach scene is different

10.15.22  11:20 pm   help I fell up my staircase, what do i do???

      climb back down

10.15.22  10:49 pm   Just putting my two cents in- when I heard "lobster section" I thought of it as just a name. Like the "living room" or the name of the restaurant, or like sometimes in parking garages they'll give an animal or a state or something to each level, just to make it more memorable. That's how I thought of it. Like a category, a name to refer to the room.

Also for some reason I thought of it being really fancy, which was why one of the friends was nervous to go there

      that's the most logical thing i've heard all week

10.15.22  9:33 pm   I know you said you have friends, and that they're pretty friendly, but exactly how many friends do you have,

     too many to count

      and how friendly is "pretty friendly"

      enough to break the game

10.15.22  9:08 pm   What are you thoughts on a 7/8 time signature

      it could also be considered 3.5/4

10.15.22  9:02 pm   what's a verse?  what's a chorus?

      no one really knows for sure
